Class GenericArtifactHelper

java.lang.Object

public class GenericArtifactHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class helps to generate and parse the schema defined generic xml artifact format

jnicolai

createGenericArtifactJavaObject

public static com.collabnet.ccf.core.ga.GenericArtifact createGenericArtifactJavaObject(org.dom4j.Document document)
                                                                                 throws com.collabnet.ccf.core.ga.GenericArtifactParsingException
Parses an XML document that complies to the generic artifact schema and represents it as a Java object

Parameters:
document - XML representation of the generic artifact
Returns:
Java object representing the artifact
Throws:
com.collabnet.ccf.core.ga.GenericArtifactParsingException - exception is thrown if XML document does not comply to the schema

Creates a generic artifact XML representation out of the Java object

Returns:
XML representation of generic artifact
